data.name: OMSI 2 Add-On Citybus M301
data.detailed_description:
The OMSI 2 Add-on Citybus M301 contains the detailed model of a 11 meter long high-floor three-door city bus.

Equipped with a euro-3 turbocharged diesel engine and a 3-speed automatic gearbox with retarder, the bus convinces with a completely operational dashboard as well as original engine sounds.

Apart from that, it is possible to customize the city bus according to your own taste: amongst others, the curtains, wheel caps, mirrors and handrails can be changed.


  • Detailed 3D body and interior models based on scale drawings and photo sessions with the real buses
  • Photorealistic interior and exterior textures
  • Photorealistic snow and dirt overlays depending on the weather conditions
  • Original engine and misc sounds recorded from MAZ-103.065 bus depending on the in-game bus condition
  • Fully operational dashboard
  • Modular development with lots of internal and external configuration options

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: min. 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: min. 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
